name: gouache
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] a method of painting that uses colours mixed with water and a substance to make them thicker: Illustrator Lynne Avril Cravath used gouache and coloured pencils to create the delightfully vibrant, playful illustrations.
[ C ] a painting that is produced using this method: Among the most important works here are the gouaches made from 1927 to 1928.
